Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 26th overall pick, by Houston in 2010...
Traded from Houston to Seattle on 4/1/2010 (Going to SEA: 2B T. Lindsey. Going to HOU: RF B. Fargo)...
Injured on 5/31/2010 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/8/2013 with a Inflamed Back Muscle, out for one week...
Had first career hit on 7/19/2013, off Rocky Biddle (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/3/2013, off Joba Chamberlain (BAL)...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Boston on 9/21/2013...
Had 5 hits with 0 RBI against Los Angeles (A) on 8/23/2014...
Won Gold Glove Award at Shortstop in 2014...
Injured on 4/25/2015 with a Strained Achilles Tendon, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/8/2017, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Kansas City on 4/2/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/18/2018, hitting .467 with 1 HR, 11 RBI...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/4/2018 with a Tight Knee, out for one week...
Hit for the cycle against Los Angeles (A) on 6/26/2023...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles (A) on 6/26/2023...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2023, hitting .444 with 2 HR, 5 RBI...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against Minnesota on 8/15/2023...
